fieldUpdates.formula: IF(!ISPICKVAL(Topic__c, 'Member Not Found'), If( ContactId != null, SUBSTITUTE(MID(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(Contact.Birthdate), LEFT(TEXT(Contact.Birthdate),4), '') +'/' + LEFT(TEXT(Contact.Birthdate),4),2,LEN(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(Contact.Birthdate), LEFT(TEXT(Contact.Birthdate),4), '') +'/' + LEFT(TEXT(Contact.Birthdate),4))), '-', '/'), IF(Interaction__r.Third_Party__c != null, TEXT(Interaction__r.Third_Party__r.DOB__c), DOB__c)), DOB__c )
fieldUpdates.name: Update Case DOB

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Topic__c, '')),IF(!ISPICKVAL(Topic__c, 'Member Not Found'), If(ContactId != null,Contact.FirstName + ' ' + Contact.LastName , IF(Interaction__r.Third_Party__c != null,Interaction__r.Third_Party__r.First_Name__c + ' ' +Interaction__r.Third_Party__r.LastName__c,Subject_Name__c)), Subject_Name__c) ,Subject_Name__c)
fieldUpdates.name: Update Case Subject Name

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(ISBLANK(TaxID__c), IF(Interaction__r.Originator__c != null , Interaction__r.Originator__r.Tax_ID__c, Interaction__r.Third_Party__r.Tax_ID__c), TaxID__c)
fieldUpdates.name: Update Tax ID

fieldUpdates.description: This will update the withdrawn case to closed page layout.
fieldUpdates.name: Update Withdrawn Case Page Layout

rules.fullName: ACET Update Case Fields Workflow Rule
ACET Update Case Subject ID Workflow Rule
rules.description: Updates subject ID. Removed SNI Case Types from workflow.
rules.formula: (ISNEW()&& ISCHANGED( Interaction__c) || ISCHANGED(ContactId)) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Interaction__r.Originator_Type__c, 'Member')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Interaction__r.Originator_Type__c, 'Provider')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Interaction__r.Originator_Type__c, 'Group/Employer')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Interaction__r.Originator_Type__c, 'Producer')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Interaction__r.Originator_Type__c, 'General Agent')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Interaction__r.Originator_Type__c, 'UHG')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Interaction__r.Originator_Type__c, 'Other')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Interaction__r.Originator_Type__c, 'Broker') || NOT(ISPICKVAL(Case_Type__c, 'Opportunity')) || NOT(ISPICKVAL(Case_Type__c, 'Support Request')) || NOT(ISPICKVAL(Case_Type__c, 'Proactive Alert')))

rules.description: Record type will be change back for Proactive_Action reopened cases and notification email sent to Case previous owner
Record type will be change back for Reactive_Resolution reopened cases and notification email sent to Case previous owner

rules.fullName: ECM Update Createby Role WorkFlow Rule
rules.description: Rule to update Case Creators Role Name

rules.formula: ISBLANK(Owner_Profile__c ) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Reopen')) && RecordType.DeveloperName != 'RESCU' && RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Proactive_Alert' && RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Reactive_Resolution' && RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Motion'

rules.description: This rule will be fired to Uncheck the field 'No More Comments' on Case Object to by pass Validation Rule 'ERM_Prevent_Reopen_Closed_Case' when Apex class 'ERM_RequestController' is fired
When FPS case status is closed, assign the all read only fields, except Case Comments
Updates the Onshore Restriction value for an Impact -> ACET case to No
Whenever case owner of the Motion Case is changed to Person or Queue, the Case status must change to Routed.
Rule moves closed SAE cases to closed record type. US2559360 will also move canceled cases to closed record type - AP
Updates the Support Request status to Assigned when ownership changed to a person.
rules.formula: RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Support_Request' && ISCHANGED(OwnerId) && NOT(ISBLANK(Owner_Profile__c )) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Follow Up')) && ((NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'On Hold')) ||(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'On Hold') && ( OwnerId != CreatedById ))))

rules.description: When status of support request changes to 'Closed' it Changes Support Request Record Type to Support Request Closed record type
Changes record type for closed proactive alerts to the Proactive Alerts - Closed record type to make it read only.
Rule to update the SRS Agent field when an SRS agent takes ownership of a case from SRS queue

rules.fullName: Submitting Department Not Equals to Other
rules.description: If Submitting Department is NOT selected as Other, Team Name should be kept as N/A.
Updates fields on the case overview during data migration import. Only used for data migration and should be deactivated.
This will update the case withdrawn date/time to current time once the case status is set to Withdrawn.
Update Trigger_Initial_MP_Record__c on change of priority of case to recalculate the Case target date
